sections.heading: tertiary butyl ether; restriction
sections.text: On or after July 13, 2000, a retailer shall not offer for sale in this state any petroleum product that contains more than one percent of methyl tertiary butyl ether (MTBE) by volume. For purposes of this section, retailer has the same definition as in section 66-48

66-1227.Methyl tertiary butyl ether; restriction.

On or after July 13, 2000, a retailer shall not offer for sale in this state any petroleum product that contains more than one percent of methyl tertiary butyl ether (MTBE) by volume. For purposes of this section, retailer has the same definition as in section 66-482.

SourceLaws 2000, LB 1234, ยง 17.
